title: Buying watermelon in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about buying watermelon in a dream for a single woman: Buying watermelon in a dream for a single girl has many happy and good interpretations, such as: When an unmarried girl dreams that she is buying watermelon. This indicates that she will establish a relationship and marry someone who will make her feel reassured. Also, this dream is for an unmarried girl. Married woman is a sign of good luck. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is buying a large watermelon, this means that she will have a wealthy and humble groom. As for red watermelon in a dream, it is evidence of the abundance of nutrition that the dreamer will gain. Interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream for a married woman: Buying watermelon in A dream for a married woman is evidence that there is a lot of food, and the larger the watermelon, the longer she will survive. If a married woman sees watermelon in a dream and delays having children, this means that she will become pregnant soon. In addition, watermelon is considered one of the things that indicate wealth, Therefore, the female dreamer is blessed with abundant sustenance. All dream interpreters say that if the watermelon is red in color In a dream, this is evidence that the dreamer will give birth to a female. Also, watermelon in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that the fetus is in good health. Interpretation of seeing a man buying watermelon in a dream. All interpretation scholars say that buying watermelon in a dream for a man is a good and promising vision. Among these interpretations: Dream interpreters believe that buying watermelon in a dream is one of the dreams that has many different interpretations, but they differ depending on the color of the watermelon. They say, in dream interpretation, that watermelon in an unmarried man’s dream is evidence of his imminent marriage. And if one sees In a dream, he is buying a watermelon, but he is comparing them. This indicates that his mind is preoccupied, and he is not making the appropriate decision. And when a man sees in a dream that he is buying a watermelon or eating it, this indicates that he will succeed in a romantic relationship. But if he sees in a dream that he is eating a red watermelon But its taste is bad. This indicates that he will marry a beautiful girl, but her character will be bad. But a yellow watermelon in an unmarried person’s dream is evidence that he will establish a relationship with a girl, but will not communicate with her. And when a man sees a green watermelon in a dream, this is evidence of his engagement. But the girl will be his family’s choice, not his. If a man gets married and dreams that he is eating a red watermelon, this indicates his satisfaction with his wife. He will get married if he sees a watermelon in a dream and is unable to eat it because of the seeds. This is evidence of the presence of many problems in his married life. If he sees A married man sees a yellow watermelon in his dream. This is considered a dream worthy of praise, because this dream indicates the kindness of his wife. title: Surviving drowning in a dream and the interpretation of the dream: drowning in a pond and then being saved by Ibn Sirin.

preview.html: Escaping from drowning in a dream: There are many things that a person sees in a dream, some of which are happy, and others can be frightening for him, and there are many people who are searching for the meaning of escaping from drowning in a dream and wondering whether it indicates getting out of difficulties in Reality or not? This is why we explain the interpretations of the dream during our article. Surviving drowning in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Escaping from drowning in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of escaping from drowning proves that getting out of the crisis and getting completely out of it is approaching and that the dreamer is living these days in a big problem, but his solution is near, God willing. In If you see that you are escaping from drowning with the help of someone in a dream and you know this person, then he can be considered a good person and help you in most matters, as you depend on him in many situations in your life, and it is expected that some profit will come to you through it in the coming days. And if you ride in A large ship or boat was sunk, but you managed to escape and get out of the water, then you are about to hear the news that you have been waiting for a while and it will reach you. The benefit you want. If a person sees in his dream that he is saving someone from drowning, and it is a beautiful girl, then the dream is an expression of the young man’s attachment, but if a married man sees it, then he is a few steps away. From achieving several dreamed goals. It can be said that saving from drowning is a good sign in the world of dreams, because drowning itself indicates many crises and the lack of comfort in life for the dreamer, and therefore saving from water and escaping from it is an auspicious matter for him. Improving conditions and finding a way out of debt, God willing. Surviving drowning in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explains in the interpretation of a dream of escaping from drowning that it brings joy to a man or woman, as it is clear good news about the relief of sadness and salvation from a real problem in which a person lives. As for work, Salvation and exit from the sea or river represents a high blessing in material livelihood and a great honor that the dreamer is likely to attain in his work as a result of his continued patience. Seeing a person emerging from the water unharmed expresses the strength of his character and faces any crisis with courage without causing any harm to the person. One of the signs of a drowning survivor is that he struggles throughout his life to overcome exhaustion and difficult issues. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, Google the Egyptian dream interpretation site, which includes thousands of interpretations from leading interpretive scholars. If she finds herself trying to get out of the water and asks for help from someone, the dream It means that she is going through difficult days in which uncertain events abound and she needs support from someone around her. title: Interpretation of eating boiled eggs in a dream and the dream of peeling eggs by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Eating boiled eggs in a dream Boiled eggs are considered one of the foods that everyone prefers because of their high nutritional value, and one can see in his dream that he is eating boiled eggs, so what are the indicators related to seeing eggs? We will explain to you in the article the interpretation of consuming boiled eggs in a dream. Eating boiled eggs in a dream A dream by Ibn Sirin: Eating boiled eggs in a dream: A dream about eating boiled eggs can be interpreted as many benefits and goodness for the person who sees it. Some interpreters say that the eggs represent the women or girls present in the man’s life. But if the size of the eggs is large, most commentators say that it is a sign of happiness and kindness. And a lot of money collected by the dreamer. When eggs are peeled, this is evidence of happiness, stability, the end of some crises present in a person’s life, and the beginning of happy days for his heart. Some interpretive scholars believe that eating eggshells is a sign of nostalgia for the past days and thinking about them a lot, and this leads to many It is one of the memories that a person sees all the time. A dream about eating eggs is a sign of joy for an unmarried person about the improvement of his emotional conditions and the arrival of an ideal life partner who has good status and influence. If you see that you are carrying a lot of boiled eggs in a bowl and walking with them, it can be said that you are ready to achieve what you want from your dreams. It is likely that your ambitions will be fulfilled. Eating boiled eggs in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explains that the presence of eggs in a dream represents peace of mind and great nourishment that may come to the dreamer in more than one form, God willing. Eating boiled eggs indicates the livelihood of the person coming to him, which is represented by a new job that increases... His salary or linked to his success in his school year, others predict that if there are many disputes with family and family, it will end, and the situation will become more stable. It explains that a man who sees eggs in a dream is a sign of a close marriage and relationship with an attractive and beautiful woman that will change the shape and circumstances of his life. The world suggests The big thing is that if an unmarried girl sees boiled eggs, this confirms that she has reached one of the difficult matters for which she made a great effort, but did not achieve anything in the previous days. Ibn Sirin says that healthy eggs in a dream are happy things for the dreamer, while rotten eggs or Broken may indicate some unpleasant and difficult things in reality. Some of his predictions also proved that sometimes dreams of eggs are interpreted by the many complaints and hardships that the dreamer stumbles into, and God knows best. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google on the interpretation website Egyptian Dreams, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. There are many possibilities that confirm that the interpretation of a dream about eating boiled eggs for a single woman is praiseworthy because it fulfills the difficult desires present in her life. Eating eggs in a dream is for a girl who works or She creates a project that indicates many positive things for her

title: Details in the interpretation of seeing a camel in a dream from Ibn Sirin

Interpretation of seeing a camel in a dream by Ibn Sirin Scholar Ibn Sirin interprets that seeing a camel in a dream is a sign of many good things that the dreamer enjoys and his great strength of money and children, and he says that it can indicate many problems, worries and envy that the dreamer is exposed to. title: Tomatoes in a dream are good news

preview.html: But he wants to know whether tomatoes in a dream are a good omen or a bad vision, and we will learn about this in detail from our website, which will be explained in the following article. Interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream for a single girl. Tomatoes in a dream for an unmarried girl, an indicator of an abundance of goodness. , and the money that will come to her soon. There will be positive changes in her life in the near future, God willing. Tomatoes in an unmarried girl’s dream may indicate a promotion at work. Or obtaining a suitable job or success in her studies if she is a student. And if a girl sees one Good ripe tomatoes in a dream. It was a sign of the fulfillment of dreams, aspirations and goals that you had been pursuing for a long time. A lot of tomatoes in one girl’s dream. An indication that the girl has a good reputation and good morals among those she lives with. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees juice Tomatoes in her dream. This was an indication that she was exposed to problems, fears, and crises, and they would end soon, God willing. Or if the tomatoes were rotten in the dream of an unmarried girl. This dream was a sign of negative changes in her life. Her loss of important things in her life, such as her job or a lot of money. Or canceling her engagement if she is engaged, and God knows best. Rotten tomatoes in an unmarried girl’s dream also indicate a failed marriage that will pass in her life, and God knows best. Her married life, her distance from problems, and family disputes, God willing. When a married man sees that he is distributing green tomatoes in a dream. He will receive a lot of sustenance and goodness and his financial situation will change for the better, God willing. title: Just what you are looking for to interpret seeing a unicorn in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Unicorn in a dream The unicorn is one of the animals known to a large segment of people. As you are accustomed to from us on the specialized Egyptian website, we explain to you all the rare or widespread animals. We also explain to you all your dreams related to people, places, plants, numbers, and more. Therefore, in this article, we will explain the most important details of seeing a unicorn in a dream. Through the following. Seeing a rhinoceros in a dream. One of the interpreters spoke about the interpretation of a dream about a rhinoceros and said that it shows the difficult days that people will live, and they may be long and will reach several years of struggle and patience, but after they pass, the dreamer will achieve an unparalleled victory. He also pointed out that this interpretation is due to the precious piece of ivory found in the head of this animal, and therefore the dream indicates easy access after great difficulty and patience. To clarify the vision for the dreamer, an important piece of information must be clarified, which is that the unicorn has more than one color in waking life, It can be brown, black or white, and if the dreamer sees it in his dream in white, the interpretation at that time will be benign and shows that someone is watching over her with the aim of helping her and taking care of her, and perhaps she is closely involved with the visionary and the dreamer will feel her value with him. If this animal attacks the dreamer in His dream and did not harm him, the vision is good in its interpretation and indicates that the dreamer will be able to achieve his future aspirations soon. Seeing riding animals in a dream indicates different interpretations depending on the animal that is riding in the dream, but seeing the dreamer riding a unicorn in his dream will be interpreted by three signs: First: The dreamer was able to sit on the back of this animal without falling on it, indicating that he will prevail over a stubborn opponent. Second: The dream is also promising and means that the dreamer will be able to solve a violent crisis in his life, which may be financial, social, or emotional, but he will emerge from it. Safely, God willing. Third: This dream suggests that the dreamer will soon compete with someone similar to him in skills and abilities, and therefore the competition will be fierce, but the dream shows his victory. Ibn Sirin explained that if the dreamer sees that he is strong and able to tame this huge animal and it becomes easy to control it This scene symbolizes that he belongs to leadership figures who have control and leadership skills and the ability to achieve ambitions. The vision also reveals that he does not accept loss in his life, and if that happens he will rush to compensate for it better. Among the interpretations of the unicorn or unicorn that Ibn You will see that this animal may indicate a great sultan that no one wants to see in reality, perhaps to increase his prestige or for another reason. Seeing this animal in some visions suggests that the dreamer is a negative and cowardly person with many disgraceful qualities that will take him to the bottom, and if he does not... Positively, he will look for his problems and get rid of them in a quick year? To begin to set life goals that he will achieve in order to develop like a large number of people, unfortunately, he will doom himself to failure and will never rise to the absolute summit, if she sees this

title: Interpretation of seeing the river drying up in a dream for an unmarried woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a river drying up in a dream for unmarried women. Rivers are a place where water flows constantly, and there are many rivers in the world that have been the reason for reviving the lands and areas that pass through them and transforming them into the greatest expanses of green lands that give a lot of goodness, so seeing Rivers in dreams generally indicate renewal of life, food, goodness, the blessing of money and health, and the end of problems. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a dry river in a dream for an unmarried woman. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a river in a dream, interpretation by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says: Whoever dreams that he falls into the river and then leaves it, this indicates that he will fall into worries, but God will save him from them. And if someone sees in a dream that he descended from the river until he reached the mud, this indicates that this person will suffer from tragedies and worries. .. Ibn Sirin also said: Whoever sees the river entering his house in a dream, and the river’s water is pure, this indicates an abundance of money.. As for whoever sees in his dream that a river flows from his house and people drink from that river, this indicates the dreamer’s condition.. As for Whoever sees in his dream that the river takes something from his property, this indicates that the dreamer will be harmed. It is also said that if a person sees himself trying to get out of the river, this indicates that he is getting out of the oppression of the sultan or the ruler. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dry river in a dream: seeing drought Always in a dream does not mean good. Drought always indicates lack of livelihood, lack of goods, lack of money and lack of children. Drought in general does not indicate goodness, for example: As for seeing a river, it is evidence of a poor person financially, poor in morals and religion, or stingy. If a person sees himself crossing a dry river in a dream, this indicates that he is stingy with emotions. But if a girl sees herself in Dreaming that she is crossing a dry river, this indicates the arrival of a groom who is not suitable for her. Seeing a dry river may indicate a year in which there are no seeds and no goodness. Seeing the monarch in a dream praying for the river to dry up and then praying for an end to the drought indicates an attempt to find solutions to crises and problems, and God I know. Whoever sees in a dream that his wet body has dried up, this indicates that the dreamer’s home will be affected by worries and problems. Also, if one sees wet paper turning into dry paper, this indicates that he will go through a family crisis. Drought also indicates poverty and miserliness in money And feelings, and indicates anxiety, problems, deteriorating conditions, difficulty of living, and problems at work. Interpretation of a dream of seeing the river drying up in a dream for a single woman. The drying of the river indicates the delay in the marriage of an unmarried woman. It indicates the arrival of an unsuitable person. Interpretation of a dream of seeing the river drying up in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees Dreaming that the river is dry, this indicates that there are marital problems and she is facing problems in life. Drying the river in a dream can also indicate infertility and delayed childbearing. However, if the dream is that he is crossing a dry river, then this indicates the husband’s miserliness and poverty. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a river drying up in a dream for a pregnant woman: If the woman sees the dream

title: Hearing the call to prayer in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing hearing the call to prayer in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl dreams that she hears the call to prayer and enjoys hearing it. This dream indicates that this girl is righteous, close to God, does not make any commitment, has good intentions, and has a good reputation. If an unmarried girl sees that she She heard the call while she was in her room. This dream suggests that he will achieve everything he dreams of, strive to achieve, and live a quiet and stable life. But if an unmarried girl sees in her dream the sound of the call but does not pray. This vision shows that this girl is paralyzed and does not like work. Goodness, she hates goodness to people, she is immoral, she breaks her obligations and does not devote herself to prayer. When an unmarried girl sees in her sleep the sound of the call to prayer, and that sound was beautiful and calm. This vision indicates that this girl will soon be associated with a person with morals. If an unmarried girl sees in Her dream was the sound of the call to prayer, but she was sad. This vision shows that this girl is concerned with her life. She also faces many crises in her life, but she will overcome them in a short time. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees in her dream the sound of the call to prayer, then that girl also does not enjoy its sound. This dream indicates that this girl has not completed her engagement and problems will arise between them and lead to separation between them. It indicates This dream indicates that this woman understands her life, loves her husband, and takes care of her children. When a married woman sees the call to prayer in her dream, that woman was also happy when she heard the call. This vision indicates that this woman will hear good news in the coming period. Perhaps she will hear the news of her pregnancy and the birth of a boy. God willing. If a married woman sees in her dream the sound of the call but she is not optimistic. This dream shows that this woman is worried about the outcome of the work but she did not succeed. If a married woman sees in her dream that she heard the call and was crying. This dream indicates that this woman is not She is happy in her life and unhappy. She also wants to divorce her husband due to mistreatment and lack of understanding between them. When a married woman sees in her dream that she hears the call but does not intentionally pray. This vision shows the bad condition of the woman in her life. Interpretation of seeing the sound of the call to prayer in a dream about a man and its meaning. If One saw in his sleep the sound of the call to prayer, he also heard the sound during his sleep. This dream indicates that this man will hear sad news. This will affect his life, perhaps the death of someone close to him, his wife, or someone from his family. When a man sees in his dream that he heard The call to prayer, this man stands to pray. This dream indicates that this person is good and pleases his parents. His qualities are good, loving among people and he likes to give it to others. When a man sees in his dream that he heard the call, but he was sad when he heard her voice. This dream indicates that this The person is unhappy in his life. There are many debts that he is trying to pay, but he alone cannot pay them all

title: Surviving drowning in a dream and the interpretation of the dream: drowning in a pond and then being saved by Ibn Sirin.

Interpretation of the dream of escaping from drowning proves that getting out of the crisis and getting completely out of it is approaching and that the dreamer is living these days in a big problem, but his solution is near, God willing. In If you see that you are escaping from drowning with the help of someone in a dream and you know this person, he can be considered a good person and help you in most matters, as you depend on him in many situations in your life, and it is expected that some profit will come to you through it in the coming days. And if you ride in A large ship or boat was sunk, but you managed to escape and get out of the water, then you are about to hear the news that you have been waiting for a while and it will reach you. From achieving several dreamed goals. It can be said that saving from drowning is a good sign in the world of dreams, because drowning itself indicates many crises and the lack of comfort in life for the dreamer, and therefore saving from water and escaping from it is an auspicious matter for him. Improving conditions and finding a way out of debt, God willing. As for work, Salvation and exit from the sea or river represents a high blessing in material livelihood and a great honor that the dreamer is likely to attain in his work as a result of his continued patience. Seeing a person emerging from the water unharmed expresses the strength of his character and faces any crisis with courage without causing any harm to the person. One of the signs of a drowning survivor is that he struggles throughout his life to overcome exhaustion and difficult issues. title: Interpretation of eating boiled eggs in a dream and the dream of peeling eggs by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Eating boiled eggs in a dream Boiled eggs are considered one of the foods that everyone prefers because of their high nutritional value, and one can see in his dream that he is eating boiled eggs, so what are the indicators related to seeing eggs? We will explain to you in the article the interpretation of consuming boiled eggs in a dream. Eating boiled eggs in a dream A dream by Ibn Sirin: Eating boiled eggs in a dream: A dream about eating boiled eggs can be interpreted as many benefits and goodness for the person who sees it. Some interpreters say that the eggs represent the women or girls present in the man’s life. But if the size of the eggs is large, most commentators say that it is a sign of happiness and kindness. And a lot of money collected by the dreamer. When eggs are peeled, this is evidence of happiness, stability, the end of some crises present in a person’s life, and the beginning of happy days for his heart. Some interpretive scholars believe that eating eggshells is a sign of nostalgia for the past days and thinking about them a lot, and this leads to many It is one of the memories that a person sees all the time. A dream about eating eggs is a sign of joy for an unmarried person about the improvement of his emotional conditions and the arrival of an ideal life partner who has good status and influence. If you see that you are carrying a lot of boiled eggs in a bowl and walking with them, it can be said that you are ready to achieve what you want from your dreams. It is likely that your ambitions will be fulfilled. Eating boiled eggs in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explains that the presence of eggs in a dream represents peace of mind and great nourishment that may come to the dreamer in more than one form, God willing. Eating boiled eggs indicates the livelihood of the person coming to him, which is represented by a new job that increases... His salary or linked to his success in his academic year, and others predict that if there are many disputes with family and family, it will end, and the situation will become more stable. It explains that a man who sees eggs in a dream is a sign of a close marriage and relationship with an attractive and beautiful woman that will change the shape and circumstances of his life. The world suggests The big thing is that if an unmarried girl sees boiled eggs, this confirms that she has reached one of the difficult matters for which she made a great effort, but she did not achieve anything in the previous days. Ibn Sirin says that healthy eggs in a dream are happy things for the dreamer, while rotten eggs or Broken may indicate some unpleasant and difficult things in reality. Some of his predictions also proved that sometimes dreams of eggs are interpreted by the many complaints and hardships that the dreamer stumbles into, and God knows best. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google on the interpretation website Egyptian Dreams, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. It was a sign of the fulfillment of dreams, aspirations and goals that you had been pursuing for a long time. A lot of tomatoes in one girl’s dream. An indication that the girl has a good reputation and good morals among those she lives with. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees juice Tomatoes in her dream. This was an indication that she was exposed to problems, fears, and crises, and they would end soon, God willing. Or if the tomatoes were rotten in the dream of an unmarried girl. Rotten tomatoes in an unmarried girl’s dream also indicate a failed marriage that will pass in her life, and God knows best. title: Just what you are looking for to interpret the vision of a unicorn in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Unicorn in a dream The unicorn is one of the animals known to a large segment of people. As you are accustomed to from us on the specialized Egyptian website, we explain to you all the rare or widespread animals. We also explain to you all your dreams related to people, places, plants, numbers, and more. Therefore, in this article, we will explain the most important details of seeing a unicorn in a dream. Through the following. Seeing a rhinoceros in a dream. One of the interpreters spoke about the interpretation of a dream about a rhinoceros and said that it shows the difficult days that people will live, and they may be long and will reach several years of struggle and patience, but after they pass, the dreamer will achieve an unparalleled victory. He also pointed out that this interpretation is due to the precious piece of ivory found in the head of this animal, and therefore the dream indicates easy access after great difficulty and patience. To clarify the vision for the dreamer, an important piece of information must be clarified, which is that the unicorn has more than one color in waking life, It can be brown, black or white, and if the dreamer sees it in his dream in white, the interpretation at that time will be benign and shows that someone is watching over her with the aim of helping her and taking care of her, and perhaps she is closely involved with the visionary and the dreamer will feel her value with him. If this animal attacks the dreamer in His dream and did not harm him, the vision is good in its interpretation and indicates that the dreamer will be able to achieve his future aspirations soon. Seeing riding animals in a dream indicates different interpretations depending on the animal that is riding in the dream, but seeing the dreamer riding a unicorn in his dream will be interpreted by three signs: First: The dreamer was able to sit on the back of this animal without falling on it, indicating that he will prevail over a stubborn opponent. Second: The dream is also promising and means that the dreamer will be able to solve a violent crisis in his life, which may be financial, social, or emotional, but he will emerge from it. Safely, God willing. Third: This dream suggests that the dreamer will soon compete with someone similar to him in skills and abilities, and therefore the competition will be fierce, but the dream shows his victory. Ibn Sirin explained that if the dreamer sees that he is strong and able to tame this huge animal and it becomes easy to control it This scene symbolizes that he belongs to leadership figures who have control and leadership skills and the ability to achieve ambitions. The vision also reveals that he does not accept loss in his life, and if that happens he will rush to compensate for it better. Among the interpretations of the unicorn or unicorn that Ibn You will see that this animal may indicate a great sultan that no one wants to see in reality, perhaps to increase his prestige or for another reason. Seeing this animal in some visions suggests that the dreamer is a negative and cowardly person with many shameful qualities that will take him to the bottom, and if he does not Positively, he will look for his problems and get rid of them in a quick year? To begin to set life goals that he will achieve in order to develop like a large number of people, unfortunately, he will doom himself to failure and will never rise to the absolute top, if she sees this

title: Interpretation of seeing the river drying up in a dream for an unmarried woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dry river in a dream for unmarried women, rivers are a place where water flows constantly, and there are many rivers in the world that were the reason for reviving the lands and areas through which they pass and transforming them into the greatest areas of green land that give a lot of good, so seeing rivers in dreams generally indicates the renewal of life, food, goodness, the blessing of money, health and the end of problems. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a dry river in a dream for an unmarried woman. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a river in a dream, interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says: Whoever dreams that he falls into the river and then leaves it, this indicates that he will fall into worries, but God will save him from them.. And if someone sees in a dream that he descended from the river until he reached the mud, this indicates that this person will suffer from tragedies and worries.. Ibn Sirin also said: Whoever sees the river entering his house in a dream, and the river water is pure, this indicates an abundance of money.. As for whoever sees in his dream that a river flows from his house and people drink from that river, this indicates the dreamer's condition. As for whoever sees in his dream that the river takes something from his property, this indicates that the dreamer will be harmed.. It is also said that if a person sees himself trying to get out of the river, this indicates that he is getting out of the injustice of the sultan or ruler. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dry river in a dream Seeing drought always in a dream does not mean good. Drought always indicates a lack of livelihood, a lack of goods, a lack of money, and a lack of children. Drought in general does not indicate goodness, for example: As for seeing a river, it is evidence of a poor person financially or poor in morals and religion or stingy. If a person sees himself crossing a dry river in a dream, this indicates that he is stingy with emotions. But if a girl sees herself in a dream crossing a dry river, this indicates the arrival of a groom who is not suitable for her. Seeing a dry river may indicate a year in which there are no seeds or goodness. Seeing the monarch in a dream calling for the river to dry up and then praying to end the drought indicates trying to find solutions to crises and problems, and God knows best. Whoever sees in a dream that his wet body has dried up, this indicates that the dreamer's house will be affected by worries and problems. Also, if a person sees wet paper turning into dry paper, this indicates that he will go through a family crisis. Drought also indicates poverty and stinginess in money and feelings and indicates anxiety, problems, deterioration of conditions, difficulty of living and work problems. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a river dry up in a dream for a single woman The drying up of the river indicates the delay of the marriage of an unmarried woman. It indicates the arrival of an unsuitable person. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a river dry up in a dream for a married woman If If a married woman sees in a dream that the river is dry, this indicates that there are marital problems and she is facing problems in life. The drying up of the river in a dream can also indicate infertility and delayed childbearing. However, if the dream is that he is crossing a dry river, this indicates the husband’s stinginess and poverty. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a river dry up in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees

title: Hearing the call to prayer in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing hearing the call to prayer in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl dreams that she hears the call to prayer and enjoys hearing it. This dream indicates that this girl is righteous, close to God, does not make any commitment, has good intentions, and has a good reputation. If an unmarried girl sees that she She heard the call while she was in her room. This dream suggests that he will achieve everything he dreams of, strive to achieve, and live a quiet and stable life. But if an unmarried girl sees in her dream the sound of the call but does not pray. This vision shows that this girl is paralyzed and does not like work. Goodness, she hates goodness to people, she is immoral, she breaks her obligations and does not devote herself to prayer. When an unmarried girl sees in her sleep the sound of the call to prayer, and that sound was beautiful and calm. This vision indicates that this girl will soon be associated with a person with morals. If an unmarried girl sees in Her dream was the sound of the call to prayer, but she was sad. This vision shows that this girl is concerned with her life. She also faces many crises in her life, but she will overcome them in a short time. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees in her dream the sound of the call to prayer, then that girl also does not enjoy its sound. This dream indicates that this girl has not completed her engagement and problems will arise between them and lead to separation between them. Perhaps she will hear the news of her pregnancy and the birth of a boy. God willing. If a married woman sees in her dream the sound of the call but she is not optimistic. This dream shows that this woman is worried about the outcome of the work but she did not succeed. If a married woman sees in her dream that she heard the call and was crying. This dream indicates that this woman is not She is happy in her life and unhappy. She also wants to divorce her husband due to mistreatment and lack of understanding between them. When a married woman sees in her dream that she hears the call but does not intentionally pray. This vision shows the bad condition of the woman in her life. Interpretation of seeing the sound of the call to prayer in a dream about a man and its meaning. If One saw in his sleep the sound of the call to prayer, he also heard the sound during his sleep. This dream indicates that this man will hear sad news. This will affect his life, perhaps the death of someone close to him, his wife, or someone from his family. When a man sees in his dream that he heard The call to prayer, this man stands to pray. This dream indicates that this person is good and pleases his parents. His qualities are good, loving among people and he likes to give it to others. When a man sees in his dream that he heard the call, but he was sad when he heard her voice. This dream indicates that this The person is unhappy in his life. There are many debts that he is trying to pay, but he alone cannot pay them all
